answers: b"Pricking is a way to puncture your subtle body- it takes about a day to heal. Amorous spirit may throw a tantrum should their work go in vain. Spirits which introduce themselves to your life uninvited have tendency to be opportunistic and those most of the time are parasitic spirits who aim to get their fill with little to no remorse to your well being- they do the the bare minimum to keep you going and crank the system to maximum this way they can draw more out of you without compromising the system. You asked how do you get rid of the spirit. It is easy you have to make the circadian rhythm stable- wake up same time go sleep same time and remain energetic throughout the day. If even one of these things are not constant the spirit will come again and again. There is a concept of subtle body which means you have energy body that operates outside of your light body (mundane body) the light body perplexes the mind because it produces the strongest current. Subtle body is the residual accumulation of light body and has the life of its own yet it completely corresponds the light body since it originates from the light body and harbors in it until the light body disperses. Then there is a concept of higher self or that which precedes our light body- it is the eventual body you recall to once subtle and light body current quiets down or you become aware of your higher self. Once the spirit is omnipresent in your life they have found the higher self and copulate with it which introduces the concept of baking the dough of infinite bliss. To bake this dough both have to stretch it with their love and it stretches forever until one doesn't want to share the bliss anymore which contracts the bliss- there is no limit to how this goes yet friction smothers the dough. This absurd nature of the bliss enables subtle body to experience indefinite orgasms both for you and the spirit. And most spirits long for this- since it requires light body to bake the dough rapidly."

Under normal circumstances they won't take your life energySuccubi take forms attractive to you naturallyNo. However- those in romantic relationships with their tulpas are welcomeSame methodLinks:https://fuccasucc.wordpress.com/2020/11/11/pros-and-cons/https://succupedia.wordpress.com/2016/03/10/letter-of-intent-how-to-summon-a-succubusincubus/https://mysterysuccubusblog.wordpress.com/2020/12/03/the-4-succubus-queenshttps://succubithoughts.wordpress.com/2020/12/27/aghttps://pastebin.com/UUFd3eX8"
answers: b"Of course you are aware of this and at every moment- you interact with the spirit and it immediately responds and there is no limit to how far you can take it at any given time since they are not bound by mundane sphere nor are you it is the body that binds you if you let it- the only way they interact with our light body is through our bioresonance and as they are residual beings of light themselves they know how to realign the body accordingly- they don't have to do anything but interact with our biomagnetism which is the interface- our every cell emits light receives light and interprets light and they mimic this light as well- by altering the frequency of human cells they initiate realignment and the longer you are out of your natural homeostasis the more you adapt to the new. The concept of higher self should be thought more as a wind of change that in very fundamental level makes you drawn to certain behavior and people- it is separate from your subtle body and light body. It is a rail that manifests as everything you go through- similarly spirits are formless as in where they originally originated from so is the higher self- as it is a current that keeps flowing until it aligns differently- ordinarily you are preoccupied in a need to be expansive and borderless which makes you spill the current your higher self sustains. It is the residue that makes the spirits take a form whom they feed off from and copulate with giving them true form- should it be in manner of consuming something or someone or be like a butterfly that drinks their fill out of the current. This is the genesis of spirits way before the development we see today. Then the question is- how does any of this affect our higher self- it doesn't it is a cycle of energy that doesn't exit the pool as they are drawn to the same pool over and over again it is the alignment that changes constantly since the energy doesn't escape or perish."

answers: b"The vortex is never ending this is the higher self- it contains all permutations you have gone through including past lives. And nirvana as we think it is when we realign this vortex in a way that it stops spilling the current. Every spill manifests as something- and this current goes and goes and goes like universe there is always a bigger galaxy and center- yet higher self is omnipotent you are living potentially hundreds or thousands of lifetimes simultaneously as if fragmented- but every spill is just another lifetime waiting to be rearranged by the vortex. And spirits who engage with the vortex are in many ways vortex of their own who circle our vortex and the surface of the overlapping vortexes mix new realities until they find harmonious alignment and stop spilling. This is at the way I have perceived it since the very moment I realized the nature in which we now operate. You have to find the alignment or wind that makes you tick right otherwise the system doesn't find harmony here or there. And this is why compassion is proposed as blissfulness isn't limited by anything but you and you can expand it to everything- and baking the blissfulness through compassion is the only lasting solution. Every other way of looking at it will eventually lead to destruction of it. So you might ask what was the original sin that lead to this travesty we now face. It might be as simple thing as matter of time- if something is possible it will happen eventually. There are of course other aspects to this- yet this is reality at least for me concerning amorous union and there will be others consorting your higher self and compete about the bliss- as it is somewhat scarce to find someone who can make the dough properly with a light body. And light body just makes it well almost indefinitely faster only limiting factor being your borders."

answers: b'i\xe2\x80\x99m back again. i realized after re reading the guide i had done several things wrong. i redid the ritual (properly this time) at 3am last night while listening to a lilith enn and did some meditation afterwards. i felt a bit of an odd feeling before i went to sleep but nothing so far. i will keep updating as time passes. any tips on how to connect with her and advance our relationship? youtube videos and articles are helpful- as well as any personal tips.'

answers: b"It is arbitrary you can do whatever you want. Many choose the path of least resistance this way the self emerges easiest and you don't have to do anything it naturally pervades the body. There is no right or wrong there are only consequences which cascade to different developments. If you want to minimize consequences you have to observe the causality which behavior leads to what. Convoluting everything is a way for you to proceed via process of elimination what feels right and what doesn't you intrinsically know what you are drawn to and what works for you. Or you make up your mind and live the life you always dreamt of and stick to it no matter what is calling for you- nothing can stop self. While you are selfless in its core I mean you are not the body and you are merely observing the phenomena unfolding- the vortex or the current dictates the life- it is up to you choose the body or the self. It boils down to your routine as we live cyclical life and so does the spirits the same things recur over and over- what belongs to the body and what doesn't is only tangible via our routines. You can't change anything if the routines are set in stone. So you let go and feed the body and everything will happen according to our higher self or the vortex. And because it is hard to judge what should we do really it is easier to not do anything this way you stop convoluting your life. But the reality is most of us are so tangled with every day life and probably stress changing the trajectory is borderline impossible without long term repercussions- so defusing the situation where we have lead our lives until this point is the other part. There is no goal here or there you are already complete- the question is are you ready to pursuit frictionless lifestyle. You know how it would look like already- simplistic as possible."

answers: b'It is the mind that convolutes everything since where the mind is so are the energies and energies cascade in a way that propagate friction and suffering. Being mindless is as close to self as we will ever be- the moment we evaluate something we put energy behind it and continue to feed energy and expand and pursuit it until the mind directs elsewhere. And this is the part where calming the body becomes relevant as the strongest current in your body redirects our attention to itself and in most cases it will be friction and friction short circuits the body as it draws energy like nothing else it is like throwing gasoline to a fire. You can try to forcing your mind into something negative that pesters you it will exhaust you like nothing else you will be a zombie after one hour and the first symptom will be depression since depression is your bodily response to prevent the current from dispersing- so it tries to protect body by doing so. But negativity is a great vacuum that spawns and cascades new consequences and you will be met with a forceful alignment to get rid of that which leads to a negative response in our body- and negativity is about destruction and removal. And positivity- you seek things that bring positivity to you and so they both are now part of your routine. Positivity is self expanding and propagating and negativity is self destructing and contracting. First is about pervading and latter depletion. And the balance of these two make the mind and body. Both out of the need to preserve self. And in the middle is steady frictionless flow- too much positivity and negativity creeps in too much negativity and positivity creeps in. Yet we have to let these things happen with our mind if you are negative you remain negative if you are positive you remain positive- but the idea creeps to you and should you let it in it will grow.'

answers: b"And all those are no news. We all know these things it is that we are no longer interested in self. You want to see what is happening instead of making it happen. That is the curse of our 21st century things are repeatedly forced down our throats willingly or unwillingly and it is up to us choose whether we swallow it. No matter how you feel about things you still have to consider them since they beg for your attention and most of the times steal your attention- then we develop way of operating the mind by delegating evaluation to our patterns which humans are exceedingly good with- since the influx of information and choices are too cumbersome to contemplate repeatedly with adequate attention therefore we sacrifice a lot of our integrity and that makes us tick different. The worst part comes when we compare things or contemplate what sates us more- and that is when we have already made our mind without touching the thing how much do we miss this way. So what I am trying to say here is we are very frivolous what we give chance to since we evaluate much of our behavior through the lens of satisfaction. And then you will be disappoint- repeatedly. Or so desire works- it rarely is amazing enough and when it is you can't enough of it. We don't want to step out of our bounds anymore because we are afraid of being hurt or stressed out because the world we live in impose so much anxiety to those who take it in- and we wouldn't if our parents didn't live in absolute unprecedented wealth like no one ever before. Most choices ever in man kind represented front of us and here we are raised by either people with endless ambition or those who couldn't keep their seed in their ballsacks ten years longer. If you ask why are you doing this or anything most answer to please their parents if that is not sick what is. Then again this is just belittling our boomer generation who had it too well and too little problems and they passed their way of behaving to the offspring."

What all have we already destructed and how much more do we need destruction before we all spiral out of control. Yet I am not worried slightest or I am for the ones who will suffer repeatedly. You are responsible for one thing only and that is your body and health nothing else. What you choose to do with the body is different thing though as there will be repercussions. If you're unprepared for a potentially lifelong relationship- or at the very least- a life-long open door connection with sexual spirits and the occult- avoid this topic entirely. If you have a loving relationship with your human spouse or partner and desire a sex spirit to spice things up- or if you want a human partner in the future take caution- as these entities can be jealous or decide an initially open relationship is no longer so (request an open relationship during the summoning ritual). These spirits can harm or kill you when sufficiently angered and not easily banished.Last thread: Old threads: https://archive.4plebs.org/x/searchFAQ:Female spirits of sexual desire- who often choose human mates. They can't be banished with holy objectsThe Letter Method is used to focus your intent into a message to one of the Four Succubus Queens- requesting that they match you with one of their daughters. No blood or soul sacrifice necessary. See linksSuccubi use sexual energy- which is released naturally during sex. Under normal circumstances they won't take your life energySuccubi take forms attractive to you naturallyNo. However- those in romantic relationships with their tulpas are welcomeSame methodLinks:https://fuccasucc.wordpress.com/2020/11/11/pros-and-cons/https://succupedia.wordpress.com/2016/03/10/letter-of-intent-how-to-summon-a-succubusincubus/https://mysterysuccubusblog.wordpress.com/2020/12/03/the-4-succubus-queenshttps://succubithoughts.wordpress.com/2020/12/27/aghttps://pastebin.com/UUFd3eX8"
answers: b"And you can expand this wind to everything around you because the light body has the intrinsic capability to rapidly expand this wind unlike subtle body- and I am not certain whether this property is inflated in human system or not. And this thing can be considered tantric exercise as well- weaving the energies- though having grasp of how bliss behaves contracts and expands is impossible to demonstrate via words but compassion is a great way to introduce expansion to it. But what is the strongest way is our primitive intuition and sexual tendencies to purge stress out of the body which these interactions do- you heal the body by attuning to these frequencies the wind bring both to the spirit and you. So you then might ask if you have the wind does the spirit has its own? Yes they do- and this is why you need two to bake the dough if you want to- they lure the wind out of you and intertwine it with their own- yet your wind is way stronger and more tangible as it pervades our system with ease. This is the unique property of light bodies they possess enormous quantities of energy- and you easily have five to ten times more energy than a spirit in your prime. But we don't really reach these potentials because of our lifestyles as we don't appreciate health the same way we did before.On whose mandateIt is opportunism- and we have created the window for them to jump in ourselves- and I never blame the victim- if something can be taken the spirits will take it if they deem you don't need it yourself. They can justify their behavior with any number of reasons this is their boldness. This continues to happen until we humans become aware of what is happening- if we are unaware things will continue to happen. Yet we can stop it with a blink of an eye if we want it. But you have to choose to let go of it. It is until you condemn their behavior completely acceptable in the eyes of celestials who oversee the jurisdiction of everyones behavior."

answers: b'We have no chance against spirits to begin with- they know you through and through or at least have very good idea. Then they have the time to make the case for their behavior and way of creeping to your life. Easiest way is violation of your personal borders as like rape as that is the most personal someone can ever get and that level of intimacy- if we don\'t straight condemn it what will we condemn. Being in shock is not enough you have to condemn the spirit to hell for what they have done. Being angry or bearing vengeance does nothing but give the spirit leverage over you. You either intersect the spirit and strike it down or condemn and wait for celestials to strike them down for you. But when enticing and beautiful women at least from your perspective rapes you or allures you to "consensual" union it is who let it happen- we let things happen all the time we don\'t raise voice because we don\'t value our health enough. And spirits know this- the more suffering our lives go through the number our response becomes and it is not only applicable for them but arguably maintained by the spirits in the world the direction we are heading as a society and mankind. And this will never end until the ignorance of our behavior disperse. You can turn inward and I promise you the spirit has nothing on you and never will- and the only way you turn inward is by taking care of the circadian rhythm- energy levels and diet. This way the body naturally calms down and reaches homeostasis it never had. And the violations we have in our lives doesn\'t happen without celestials approval- if pertains to destruction ignorance anything goes- and ignorance as in not knowing what any behavior results in- both in us and others.'

answers: b"I apologize if I sounded morally-full-of-myself (and self-unaware). My main point was to express my disliking of the dichotomy set forth by the anon I was replying to- as his post implied that most/all spirits seek to drive men away from their principles- and/or that they mostly/all serve the being known to laymen as 'satan'. Of course- this is unfalsifiable - humans cannot get straight answers from unaccountable partially-intangible beings- and some (but not all) encounters with said beings may actually be made up or imagined- so at best these observations would be subjective- and at worst- completely fabricated.Nonetheless- my belief is that not all spirits seek to compromise one's principles- and the constant insistence otherwise can be simultaneously blamed on puritans & edgy theistic-satanists both looking for recruits for their respective groups."

answers: b'I\'ve heard of people talk about an entity called "Baphomet"- and I think Satanists have adopted the Christian practice of using The Baphomet to represent Satan- but in my understanding- The Baphomet is a symbol within spiritual alchemy symbolizing the union of opposites in pursuit of enlightenment.That\'s why it has male- female- animal- and human traits- and that\'s why it has "Solve" and "Coagula" written on its arms.Yeah- I kinda took that meme as a little jokey... (Like we\'re born into debt...)'

answers: b"you can indirectly distinguish them based on how they behave. Summoning a love spirit results in some very different outcomes- and takes very different inputs- compared to making a tulpa.You can directly distinguish them by scanning. That's a topic in and of itself if you're a beginner and don't even know what scanning isand yes- some people have spirits which they think are tulpas (which did not originate from them- and were never a tulpa) and some people have a tulpa (which either did or currently is originating from them) which they think is a spiritthe thing is though- tulpas are spirits. And they can become fully fledged and independent from you- given enough time and development. The way they work is- a tulpa is a human spirit (like you)- but they start out from a fully formed human- rather than being born and having a body and having a normal human childhood. So they are disembodied human spirits- which is a little weird. Cuz they aren't dead- they just started out with no body.It's just a question of where it came from. Did it come from you- or did it come from the outside."

answers: b'pic unrelated just wanted to post itNo I\'m actually making the point that an individual spirit will fulfill all the archetypes to make you happy. Not that "you can find a spirit amongst the vast multitude which will be compatible with you" though that is also true.If your preferences change- they will change to satisfy those new preferences. They kinda just want to make their partner happy. It\'s what they do. They\'re love spirits.There are some limits to this though. Mostly based on YOUR ability to embody the accompanying archetype. Meaning- if it\'s awkward for you and you don\'t really like being in that way- they\'ll go back to what ACTUALLY makes you happy.Cuz they do that. They listen to your subconscious- then do the thing that actually makes you happy.And also some of what they would actually enjoy giving. But spirits are weird man. They are very flexible mentally- far more than a normal human is. They can just morph and shift if they want to. Not just shapeshifting their appearance- deeper than that too.'

answers: b"Sorry if this is a dumb question but on top of improving my meditation are there other things I can do to help improve communication with an entity I am in contact with?I started off meditating for a bout 30 minutes everyday a few months ago and have since moved up to doing it at least an hour or two hours a day and doing mini bursts through out the day. I am currently at a point I can physically see them as a colorless mist that can at times go to a hazy fog and to a gas / flame like motion when it grows in intensity. I'm trying to get to a point where I can discern what I hear in my mind is them and not projecting something from my own imagination. I know there have been times where it was them due to things they pointed out outside of my awareness but I've yet to grasp a means of distinction which is them at the moment.This is not a well known spirit or deity figure as they were the ones that reached out to me via dreams and as an aspiration. They identify as fae and don't seem to want offerings but dose seem to appreciate energy offerings and just getting my attention. By I've also taken up trying scrying- use black crystals- and tarot but they discourage tarot it seems. That is if I'm right- thus my problem. Does this become easier over time?"

answers: b"That could just be your eyes. If you hold that long enough- you should be able to flip to spirit vision. However- you should stop trying to see with your eyes (if you are) and try to perceive as if changing the channel on a TV. It takes time. Stop trying to discern. Take what comes and only later consider what was or wasn't the spirit. You will learn to differentiate the subtle qualities of genuine contact- but trying to force that (because you're grasping for a feeling you haven't learned to hook onto) will distract.Dharana practice is the most straightforward way to train concentration. Otherwise just keep at it- and train all your astral senses. Concentrate on the body of light and it will become more stable."

answers: b"I honestly thought that at first til I notice it doing things on its on like moving around or vapors coming towards my hand. I tired using an old golden arrow head nickels for dowsing and I saw it attempt to try and move it but it couldn't seem to do it for some reason.I'm pretty much seeing this with with my physical eyes but can still see it when closing them. I kinda have to focus just a small bit and it starts up on command and I notice it seems to get a bit more patient when near water. Been debating trying scrying with water but I have server lower back pains so probably can't do it for long sessions. Might just keep a bowl of water near by just stop see if it effects anything. Now one entity that I believe was separate from the one I communicate with did a forced mental projection to where I was kinda seeing both with my eyes and my minds eye. It was hard to describe like it was an overlay I had no control over. Only could make out an outline of a short being walking out from behind a tree stop look at me then walked off fading. Felt like it was more their doing then my own. I'll see if I can try to do the channel changing- I just know with my eyes closes its nothing but vast amounts of various outlines blending into a background of endless shapes and colors.Ok well I guess if somethings wrong they'll try to correct me lateran or I'll eventually figure this out. I try to do that and just note what I think was and was from the afterwards. I appreciate the insight"

answers: b'I am honestly confused with house anyone can see Uranus as anything but ChockmahPluto as Kether- meh- Pluto is extremely dense- heavy- blackhole-ish- radioactive even- decaying- you feel as if you are on the brink of destruction which helps with the unmanifest side of Kether but it\xe2\x80\x99s clearly da\xe2\x80\x99at because it\xe2\x80\x99s all about the perception of being and self/non-self- it\xe2\x80\x99s a heavily destructive obsessive force that forces things to their completion - like how da\xe2\x80\x99at is an empty room waiting to be filled. It\xe2\x80\x99s the furthest of the astrological planets because it\xe2\x80\x99s the very bounds of the self- not because it\xe2\x80\x99s the highest. But neither Da\xe2\x80\x99ath nor Kether can have any planet that truly can encapsulate them- but that\xe2\x80\x99s the thing- the planetary forces are in yetzirah; a realm of clear cult concepts and archetypes where something like the unmanifest and infinite become manifest and finite- so the irony of incomprehensible things like Kether and Da\xe2\x80\x99at becoming linked to the manifested forces of Neptune- Kether\xe2\x80\x99s unknowability becoming Neptune\xe2\x80\x99s classic murky infinite depths and force of illusion and madness- and Pluto- with Da\xe2\x80\x99ath\xe2\x80\x99s emptiness manifesting as the opposite as pure mass and gravity (because opposites imply opposites into reality) - is a reality. Like how ayin is nothingness but also a letter and a path. With all this in mind- Neptune is clearly Kether because it is the root of Yeztirah. The collective unconsciousness and the whirling of all ideas as it manifests from the unmanifest- an echo of Kether- comprehensible and symbolic incomprehensibility- and it is genuinely the plane where psychedelics take you/are linked to. Man- Pluto also leaves this reddish decay behind way after you evoke anything to do with it- kind of like Mars. And it has this distinct smell of death. Gives anyone around it a headache.'

answers: b'Karma is cause and effect- it is the ripening of you actions. It does not mean that there is an universal tally saying "if you do this- this will happen to you"- it is a lot more subtle. Karma is a function of existence- flapping you eyelashes generates Karma- as do your thoughts/actions and whatever the fuck is all your aggregates are doing. Karma is categorized as Good/Bad/Neutral as are its consequences. In general it is believed that generating a lot of good Karma will get you closer to liberation- but if you\'re looking for a scientific definition of the different Karma types you\'re going to be shit out of luck.I\'m not sure thinking of Karma in terms of it helping you do "impossible" things makes much sense.'

answers: b"I started adding the Rose Cross ritual for my daily practice. Did LBRP every day for about a year- then added LBRH- then MP- now RC as well. I didn't think I had it in me to do this much daily spiritual practices- but it has increased my life quality tremendously. I've been experiencing several synchronicities and I'm finally grasping old grimoires and books that I've been reading through for the last decade. I feel that in a short amount of time I'll be primed for Enochiana. I never thought I ever would. Never stop practicing anons! and for Gabriel's sake- keep a dream journal. You need to work with and glean information from your dreams to aid in your psych-spiritual development.pictured: a small sampling of some of the magickal tools I've constructed"

answers: b"For sure mate.Step one of the ritual: take a shower- making sure to use soap. Shave. You need to purify your body before you can purify your soul.Step two: Meditate on what you like to do in your spare time- e.g. rock climbing or instruments or what have youStep three: Get a social media platform (Instagram- Snapchat are essential. Facebook if you're a boomer. Discord if you're a zoomer). This will help you later in the ritual. Make sure you only use them for communicating with people you have or are going to meet IRL- don't get sucked in.Step four: Use those platforms and other ones like meetup(com) to find others with your interests.Step five: Go to general meetings of these placesStep six: Make friends and add them on social mediaStep seven: Use social media to organize smaller meetings outside of the organization with your new friends- possibly even 1 on 1 if she's hotStep eight: ProfitDon't worry if you don't have social skills- the only way to develop them is through practice. Save some girls for me anon. Be confident- the internet drains confidence. I recommend using it less."

answers: b"well keep waiting! >:( Alright- srry- I'm much lower in energy and functioning than I assumed when I made that promiseJust- I don't have the energy to explain my practice's internal work to you- so get a pencil- paper- and a bowl full of salt or similar- write down on paper and in your mind 'all this sigil is placed unto- then provides:' < then- whatever you want- then circle the text on paper and in your mind- and point it towards a sigil- please make it as simple as possible. then visualize the text being placed unto it and know that is what it is bound to. Then- take the pencil and now draw the sigil into the bowl of salt while whispering or just- repeating the sigil's aff. Try to do so to a point that arouses significant emotional response- or enters you into a meditative state. Boom- you've made a blessed material and now have a functioning sigil- partake of the salt or place it unto you in the shower- fill a bowl with water and let it dissolve into it while you soak your hand in it or something. For someone who's never done any internal work (I'm assuming) it could take like a minute- or hours out of days to sufficiently charge it like thisthereDo the same but for the purpose of ensuring this method's success ;p"

answers: b"It's insight- right?Understand what it is that makes you hate normies on an emotional and analytical levelit's one thing to prefer your own company or the company of those who share your interests- it's another to have an aversion to anything outside you comfort zone.Maybe you're a fat- ugly- balding tranny who will never pass and you don't like 'normies' because it breaks down the deluded self image that can only be supported by fantasy and a hugboxMaybe you're a loser and there is a part of you that is jealous and resentful of people who are apparently happier than you.Maybe none of the above applies. You can analyze your issues by confronting the shit that makes you uncomfortable. Know thyself. Don't go full retard and start doing abhorrent shit that will not teach you anything.People put up masks in front of others all the time; face- facade- persona- whatever you want to call it. Putting on a mask while looking in the mirror just gives distorted self image and makes insight impossible.Maybe you'll gain nothing from the experience and have to attempt another method. If you do have some kind of aversion- then you may wish to try and figure out why.Insight."

answers: b"Sure. The Enochian heptarchia disks are simply wooden craft disks that I used a compass and paint to paint the angelic names and ensigns on. The enochian lamen was a square piece of small plywood that I covered with gold foil (gilded in the traditional way) then mapped out and painted/drew in the enochian figures. i then drw 2 small holes at the top- added a bit of super glue- and shoved a single piece of thin leather cordage into both holes. The goetic apron was made with simple mass-produced black server's apron with the pocket carefully removed (used a seam splitter)- and the image was printed on using a heat transfer vinyl by way of a cricut machine."

answers: b"Guy you're responding to here- and I felt the same way as you. For a VERY long time. but for some reason I just kept up with it.. and one day it just suddenly clicked. I actually started understanding Agrippa. Re read all of my occult books- practiced another year- it clicked again. Like my brain just had to subconsciously process all of this info- visualization and etheric movement in the background for a long time (but your mileage may vary). Even though I have done these rites for so long- I feel like I'm at the real beginning of my journey. Keep up with it- study when it strikes you- and one day when you least expect it it'll start falling into place. And when it does- you'll be so glad you did your daily rituals. Also screw that other dude- echols is just fine. He practiced magick a thousand times longer than the cumulative practices of people ITT. Is he right about everything? nope- but neither am I. answers: b'I think looking for the ACTUAL FOR REAL THIS TIME TRUE mechanism is a pointless pursuit. Magic cannot be studied and explained in the same objective way something like fluid dynamics can. You can try to get as close as possible by journaling and performing experiments- but subjectivity plays way too much of a factor. Magical technology has been developed- you work with it- stick with that works for you- drop what doesn\xc2\xb4t- try to innovate new shit if you want- and repeat.'

title: b'>Library https://contr'
question: b"https://controlc.com/370c7d08Hindu \xe2\x80\x94 Raja Yoga- Hathayoga- Shiva SamhitaTaoist \xe2\x80\x94 Foundations of Internal AlchemyTheravada \xe2\x80\x94 Knowing and SeeingSufi \xe2\x80\x94 Sufism for Non-SufisJewish \xe2\x80\x94 Jewish MeditationGeneral/Thelema \xe2\x80\x94 sacred-texts.com & hermetic.com/figures/indexAgrippa's Three Books are coreArbatel should be the first; afterward Heptameron- or Goetia- or Abramelin- Picatrix- etcThe PGM tend to be modularesotericarchives.com/Intro to Tantra- Refining Gold. Garchen Rinpoche and HHDL's whole YouTube catalogs; you can take empowerment and transmission from their recordings if vows are understood- but really you should have a teacher.The Facebook group Vajrayana Events regularly posts online empowerments- lungs- and teachings.accesstoinsight.org/tipitaka/studybuddhism.comCicero's Self Initiation into the Golden Dawn- Lyam Thomas Christopher - Kabalah- Magic & the Great Work of Self TransformationFind a Temple: pansophers.com/golden-dawn-locations/Magical Philosophy (70s editions go from I-V- modern from I-III)- then Planetary MagickThe Practical Guide seriesHave a basic understanding of the Golden Dawn system. Read Liber ABA- then go through this reading list:ordoaa.org/studlist.htmFocus on Liber Resh- E - RV- O- Astarte- and HHHFor a full curriculum- Mystical and Magical System of the A\xe2\x88\xb4A\xe2\x88\xb4Liber Null & Psychonaut- Condensed Chaos- Liber Kaos- Hands-On Chaos Magichttps://pastebin.com/KB7QhL7uhttps://pastebin.com/euWACNrK"
answers: b'Magic shares both objective and subjective elements. When you practice something like Qabalah- you are accessing the currents of power carved out through the power of all the people that practiced it before. When you participate in a given current- you become subject to the trends within it- the grooves carved out over time that form reality according to what forms power takes. This is also true of direct magical lineage- but for a much smaller chain of people rather than just the overarching forces.We also affect these currents and carve grooves out by our participation in the world. Magic might seem arbitrary because seemingly incompatible descriptions of the world can be real (or real enough) simultaneously. We contribute to the maintenance and progression of the world- and with sufficient power can create branches in a current if not change its direction altogether. When we talk about a Magus speaking His Word- that is the change we describe. In short- what I call power directly forms the subjective experience that we call reality. Shared descriptions of reality- or consesus reality- bound what is considered possible. It is easier to accomplish seemingly impossible feats alone than it is in a group- because you are competing with the consesus of all those around you. These realities are subjective- of course- and therefore illusory- and that is why the Magus is also called the Lord of Illusion. See the so-called curse of the Magus for more on that.'

answers: b'Love spells are usually to get someone to fall in love with you and they are pretty taboo since you are trying to manipulate someone\xc2\xb4s free will. There are also adjacent spells that people will use to get around this- where instead of it being a love spell- it will be a spell to make the other person think of you a lot- or make them break up with their current partner- etc. I would not say they are uncommon though- we get someone asking for a spell to spiritually rape someone at least a few times a week. In fact- I think romantic attachments are one of the primary motivators for random people to get interested into trying magic because of their sheer desperation. However from my experience I would say that most of the time the people that try this sort of stuff or try to buy a spell of some random witch on tiktok are unsuccessful. If your ex is /x/pilled and has no moral compass I would not put it past him to try some shit to get you back- but I would not get too worried unless you really are experiencing some insane shit.'

answers: b'Ever since I got into Goetia- about 2 weeks ago or so- I\'ve been waiting for a sign from the demons that this stuff works. Now it happened.I was taking a nap and in my dream I called out to Dantelion. He appeared. At first he appeared male and talked to me. I asked him whether he found my offering satisfactory or whether he wanted something else. He said he wants a specific salad with tomatoes- cucumbers and mushrooms instead. I then asked him what he thinks of another demon- I don\'t remember which name I dropped- but it might have been Sitri. He chuckled and said "the one who\'s higher than Paimon? His real name is Arvarv (or something like that)". I took this to mean that he\'s more powerful than Paimon- even though according to old grimoires Paimon should be more powerful...Dantalion then changed into a more female appearance- with a bad tail and bat wings- hovering in the air. The dream ended after that. At no point did I feel scared.Absolutely fascinating experience.'

This is an unpopular opinion most forums about magic (specially this site) since a lot of people that get interested in this stuff are edgelords- but all the people I know personally who have worked with demons in the past say that at some point they realize that it isnt worth it. He's also quite interested in the affairs of humans- making him more receptive to summonings than some other demons.Don't get me wrong- none of them care about humans in the sense that they want what's best for us- but some are very interested in what whe do- while others would rather just be left alone."

answers: b'My first ever experience with Goetia blew me away- it was extremely powerful but it also made me make sure to respect it going forward at the same time. All I did was a non evocation method with Bathin for safe travels to South America by burning a globe shaped candle with his name inscribed on it- the second night when going to sleep- I felt like I was picked up by him- astral projected to my location. Asked me if it was where I needed to go- I said yes- he said "done". As far as the travelling part went- it was the most seamless travel that I ever had- no bureaucratic hiccups- no shady taxis- no late flights and no cunt of an NPC asked me to produce my vaccination status- I also wasn\'t even bothered by customs even though I told customs to their face what I had and they didnt even bother searching me when I came back home with some of the stuff I brought back. This was JUST non-evocation. I\'ve done connective evocation once of Astaroth- looking for more meaningful work. I sort of half got an answer- I ended up just finding out that it was a skill that I really needed to learn. I asked for close to the impossible with forcalour for a death to occur without any input. No one died but said person did get plenty of injuries- so there is that.'

answers: b'I do mine differently to the golden dawn LBRP by a pretty large margin- I also borrow some elements from the star ruby such as giving the sign of silence and keeping that as I go to the next cardinal direction. After doing the cardinal directions saying YHVH- adonai etc- when I do the qabbalistic cross I imagine myself zooming out and out and out until I see nothing and essentially reunite with the god-head. I then say the four archangels as such and visualize them. I do away with the visualisation of the hexagram and pentagram after the 4 archangels from the GD system and instead I will then say above me "Metatron/Rahoorkuit/Yodhehvahheh" you can take your pick- because its the symbolism that matters- I then say within me (whatever god form you identify with) and they say below me Satanel- I am currently trying saying below me Lilith. The field of protection should not just be the four directions but also above- within and below you. I then say the opening again and close it that way.'

answers: b'NtaInteresting you bring up the from below- I just started doing that yesterday due to noting the imbalance. I don\'t have a named entity for it tho. What do you use for visualization? Metatron I do a sphere of light descending through me to make a circle/spotlight spread from beneath my feet. For "From below" I did darkness that moves up to that circle and spreads from the middle making it a white ring beneath my feet. But part of me thinks it should move through my center to above me. I\'m not sure if this is uncharted or if the balancing element to spirit is well known. It was just gifted to me during meditation.'

title: b'Purify the mind- body- an'
question: b'Purify the mind- body- and spirit- and you will not believe what you see- then you will see and understand- and soon you will close your eyes - close your eyes - and see- and you will believe.The first thing you want to do is stop ingesting toxins and maintain a ketogenic diet of unprocessed and clean foods (say no to pork and yes to grass fed beef- no to potato crisps and yes to coconut milk- no to soda yes to orange juice). Reduce caloric intake in general- and begin intermittent fasting- as well as regularly fasting for days- even only consuming bone broth for 7 days at a time. You want your body to be in it\'s best possible condition- and to do this you must learn how to place it in a state where it can very quickly heal itself- which I have just told you how to do- but you must also learn on your own.Secondary to this- you must take up the practice of meditation (pranayama yoga). The key is to to be so focused and engaged with the practice that you find yourself "in the zone" as a sports ball player might say. A non-thinking fully acting- fully aware- and fully focused mode of consciousness that is present and totally invested into the current moment. Time will fly when you\'re having fun.Tertiary note: Semen retention is real. Don\'t coom.These lifestyle changes will see much benefit in your life- and guide you closer to the spirit of holiness. You will find a sense of ease and confidence in your ability to deal with the challenges of life.You will see with your eyes closed- and you will hear the voice of many waters in silence.Those of you who dedicate themselves to the apth will manifest psychic ability.'

The ability to utilize the dreamstate in a functional and productive way- and to live on eternally in the spirit realm with a body made of light.This is a stage of human development that has been lost- and it not only unlocks psychic powers but allows us to ascend to a dimension beyond the physical. Anything you can imagine can be realized- with greater speed and greater awe the more you practice. The more of the brain you utilize- the more capable you will be- and the more you will believe - and the more you believe- the more truly magical your abilities may become.Imagine over the course of a few years you go from what you are now- to a highly performant version of that- into then attaining clairvoyance- remote viewing- lucid dreaming- even moving objects with the mind. I've seen a man drive a pencil through a table without damaging either the pencil nor the table.This is about gaining true freedom in life to do as you desire- not magic."

title: b'Is lucid dreaming the way'
question: b"Is lucid dreaming the way out of the matrix- since it'll help you maintain lucidity in the post death state?"
answers: b"You can become conscious during dreamstate and begin to study the nature of what you are perceiving from the perspective of being out of body. It can be the equivalent of the short term out of body condition that is experienced after the final disconnect from the body.. but that's not quite what it is by default; you really do have to accumulate a lot of experience to be able to be clearly and well oriented to the out of body circumstances.One thing that will very much assist in your understanding of what the afterlife consists of will be the visits you experience with the people who you have been close to during the time of their deaths and the subsequent few days as they get oriented to their circumstances or are guided around by the beings that assist in the transitions away from one life to eventually be reseated into another body. One of the things that they do is to take the recently deceased person- out of body obviously- to visit with the people who they have unfinished connections to during the sleep phase of consciousness.. If you have not developed your ability to see clearly and retain long term focus while in these phases of consciousness you may become confused very easily and even indulge in various forms of self generated illusion imagery..I have personal experience with this and have more experience than I can easily explain to those who have not also been spending years in the process of developing their own perception beyond the mundane physical linear context of our existence"

title: b'So yesterday on reddit th'
question: b'So yesterday on reddit there was a thread where this dude was talking about when he was a child- he woke up one night and saw a Blue Man looking at him through his bedroom window. When he looked into the blue man\'s eyes he seemed startled- as if surprised the child could see him. Then he disappeared.In the comments- another person posted a link to a podcast. In the podcast episode- a man describes 5 different encounters with a blue man that used to "watch him while he slept"- and that if he awoke and saw the man he would disappear.Then the comment section blows up and a bunch of people are linking from past threads and stuff- all about encounters with these blue people who look just like normal people and even have somewhat conventional looking clothing- but they are blue and surprised when you can see them.I searched reddit further and found numerous encounters with these blue people and all of the encounters are essentially identical.1. Experiencer is always asleep or trying to sleep or waking up from sleep.2. Subject is always young- only one of the people who had an experience claimed that they were an adult when it happened- all other accounts were from childhood.3. When confronted or directly viewed- the blue people would observe for only a short time and then leave.4. They are always blue.other interesting points in the accounts:1. The blue people appeared sometimes as male and sometimes as female.2. The blue people sometimes appear to be wearing clothing- and sometimes not.4. The blue people sometimes do not have a face.5. They vary in size from slightly smaller than a person- so slightly taller- but most are the same size as a person.6. Often times the same person would have a series of interactions with the same blue person many times over many years.Anyone have similar experiences or have an idea of what this could be? I\'m trying to find the original thread and when I do I\'ll link it.'
answers: b'Hindu gods are painted blue but it\xe2\x80\x99s actually described as blackish in their textshttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LMv1k49sAM0See part 2 for proof'
